title: Far Cry 2 Maps

title: The Perfect Beer
imgAltText: A screenshot showing one of the selectable beers in the Perfect Beer App
description: The app uses Newton's Law of Cooling to inform the user how much time their beer should spend in a cool environment to be served at the perfect temperature.

title: Quake Report
imgAltText: A screenshot showing the latest earthquakes in the Quake Report app
description: The principal project from the Udacity course Android Basics: Networking. This returns data about recent earthquakes which have been reported on the US Geological Survey's website.
